channel.title: thunder on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in thunder on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: The storm
item.description: It is an odd sort of night nearing summer solstice. Outside, everything lights up in flashes as bright as day as the magnificent branches of lightning strike further and further away.

item.title: For Now
item.description: October 2008 This yellow evening, Winds tell of rains to come. A healthy, happy wind That I havenâ€™t felt for so long. Dry mango leaves
